title: Mikheil Kavelashvili - Wikipedia
snippet: Zourabichvili, along with opposition ... February 2025, the European Parliament passed a resolution stating that the European Union does not recognize Kavelashvili as the legitimate president of Georgia....

title: Georgia: Ex-footballer Mikheil Kavelashvili named president
snippet: Georgia's outgoing pro-Western president, Salome Zourabichvili, has condemned Kavelashvili's election as a travesty, insisting she holds Georgia's only remaining legitimate institution. ... Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze has accused Zourabichvili of trying to harm Georgia's interests, emphasising that when her term of office ends on 29 December, she will have to retire.

title: Georgia: Ex-footballer Mikheil Kavelashvili named president - BBC News
snippet: Georgia's outgoing pro-Western president, Salome Zourabichvili, has condemned Kavelashvili's election as a travesty, insisting she holds Georgia's only remaining legitimate institution. ... Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze has accused Zourabichvili of trying to harm Georgia's interests, emphasising that when her term of office ends on 29 December, she will have to retire.

title: New Georgian President Sworn In Amid Political Standoff
snippet: TBILISI -- Mikheil Kavelashvili, a former soccer player and right-wing populist, has been sworn in as Georgia's new president amid a monthslong political crisis, likely further complicating the country's prospects for European Union membership.

title: Mikheil Kavelashvili Elected as President by College of GD MPs and Local Councilors – Civil Georgia
snippet: In a move that further widens Georgia’s deepening political divisions, former footballer Mikheil Kavelashvili was elected President of Georgia on Dece
